plot: Yohko Mono is a regular girl making her way through high school--until she learns that she is the 108th successor to a line of warriors charged with defending the earth against demons. Eventually she must fight her ultimate battle against the demon who started it all.
ending_theme: "Go, Go! Love Coup (Koi de Coup d'Etat Go Go; 恋のクーデター・ゴーゴー)" by Aya Hiskawa (ep 1)
"Not So Fast, Sexy Girl (Tokoro ga Dokkoi! Sexy Musume; ところがどっこい! セクシー娘)" by Kaori Honma (ep 2)
"I Like the Way I Don't Give Up on Myself (Ganbaru Watashi ga Suki; 頑張る私が好き)" by Aya Hisakawa (ep 5)
